igtwitter's documentation!
=====================================
.. image:: epn.png
   :target: index.html
   :alt: alt text
   :class: banner
   :width: 100px
 
ObsPy is an open-source project dedicated to provide a **Python framework for
processing seismological data**. It provides parsers for common file formats,
clients to access data centers and seismological signal processing routines
which allow the manipulation of seismological time series.

.. raw:: html

    <div class="startpage">


Indices and Tables
------------------

.. hlist::

    * `Module Index <py-modindex.html>`_

      *Lists all modules*

    * `Index <genindex.html>`_

      *All functions, classes, terms*

    </div>
